it 's being turned into a science center .

hopefully we will have a lot of help .

output.sentences: There is a creepy old building near us that used to be an asylum for the criminally insane.
We went to tour it and inside was eerie.
We took lots of pictures of the old abardoned building.
It was strange to be inside this place thinking about all the people who used to be inmates here.
Partsof the building are falling apart with exposed floorboards and parts of the floor totally gone.
